definition: to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: The peace talks reached a deadlock and nothing could be decided.
sentences.chinese: 和平谈判陷入僵局，无法做出任何决定。

sentences.english: The president suggested that a team of UN observers should be sent to the Mid-east peace talk.
sentences.chinese: 总统建议应该派一队联合国观察员参加中东和平谈判。

sentences.english: China is vigorously seeking settlement of dispute with its neighbors through peaceful negotiation.
sentences.chinese: 中国积极寻求通过和平谈判解决与邻国的争议问题。

sentences.english: Armenia reiterates its wish to settle the Nagorno-Karabakh issue through peaceful negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 亚美尼亚重申通过和平谈判解决纳卡问题的愿望。

sentences.english: The Karzai government initially rejected the Qatar host for peace talks.
sentences.chinese: 卡尔扎伊政府最初拒绝了卡塔尔提倡的和平谈判。

sentences.english: This unfortunate incident may hinder the progress of the peace talks.
sentences.chinese: 这一不幸事件可能会妨碍和平谈判的进程。

sentences.english: News reports say peace talks between the two countries have broken down with no agreement reached.
sentences.chinese: 新闻报道说两国和平谈判失败，没有达成任何协议。

sentences.english: Some argue that trying to arrest such war criminals gets in the way of peace talks.
sentences.chinese: 有人坚持认为，试图逮捕这些战犯阻碍了和平谈判。

sentences.english: The President sent a special envoy to the peace talks.
sentences.chinese: 总统派了一名特使参加和平谈判。

sentences.english: Israel says peace talks should resume without preconditions.
sentences.chinese: 以色列表示应该无条件恢复和平谈判。

sentences.english: International disputes should be solved through peaceful negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 国际争端应该通过和平谈判解决。

sentences.english: Yeltsin ruled out direct peace talks with rebel leader Jokhar Dudayev.
sentences.chinese: 叶利钦决定不与叛军领袖杜达耶夫举行和平谈判。

sentences.english: The UN sent a team of observers to the peace talks.
sentences.chinese: 联合国派了一队观察员前去和平谈判。

sentences.english: That country's military leaders have shut the door on any further peace talks.
sentences.chinese: 那个国家的军事首脑们关闭了进一步和平谈判的大门。
